locales.Name: Insight WMX200 tactical flashlight (Black)
locales.Description: The WMX200 tactical flashlight manufactured by Insight Technologies, which combines a conventional flashlight and an IR searchlight. Modded black.

locales.Name: 5.56x45 HK 30 STANAG polymer 30-round magazine (Black)
locales.Description: 30-round polymer HK Polymer mag magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition. Modded black.

locales.Name: AR-15 Daniel Defense RIS II FSP 9.5 handguard (Black)
locales.Description: The Daniel Defense RIS II FSP 9.5 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. It's made with light but durable aircraft aluminum alloy and comes equipped with 4 mounts for the installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with the M203 UBGL. Modded black.

locales.Name: EOTech EXPS3 holographic sight (Black)
locales.Description: Eotech EXPS3 holo sight. Thanks to design features it can be used with a wide range of weapons even with non-folding sights. Compatible with night vision devices by the means of NV reticle mode. Utilized by US SOCOM as a sight for operations in confined spaces. Modded black.

locales.Name: AK AKademia Bastion dust cover (Topographic)
locales.Description: The Bastion dust cover with an integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on the AK platform. Manufactured by AKademia. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Holosun LS321 Tactical device (Black)
locales.Description: Holosun LS321 is a multi-laser tactical device with green laser in the visible light spectrum, IR laser and IR searchlight. Modded black.

locales.Name: Mk47 Resolute 7.62x39 upper receiver (Topographic)
locales.Description: The Resolute upper receiver for Mk47 Mutant assault rifle, chambered in 7.62x39mm. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices. Manufactured by CMMG. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Wilcox RAPTAR ES Tactical Rangefinder (Black)
locales.Description: The early generation of the tactical device called RAPTAR combined with a rangefinder. It has visible and IR lasers, as well as an infrared illuminator. Modded black.

locales.Name: Vortex Razor HD Gen.2 1-6x24 30mm riflescope (Black)
locales.Description: A tactical riflescope designed for quick target acquisition and maximum precision. Manufactured by Vortex Optics. Modded black.

locales.Name: AR-15 Noveske Gen.3 5.56x45 upper receiver (Topographic)
locales.Description: The Gen.3 modular upper receiver for AR-based weapons, manufactured by Noveske. Fitted with mounts for attaching additional equipment. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: VPO-101 Vepr-Hunter stock (Black)
locales.Description: Regular stock for a VPO-101 Vepr Hunter. Modded black.

locales.Name: M14 TROY S.A.S.S. Chassis stock (Black)
locales.Description: The TROY Semi-Automatic Sniper System chassis is designed to match the ergonomics of M16/M4 weapon systems. This modular quad-rail system allows unlimited mounting options and keeps all optics and sights mounted and undisturbed while field stripping. Modded black.

locales.Name: SilencerCo Hybrid 46 multi-caliber sound suppressor (Special)
locales.Description: Multi-caliber silencer Silencerco Hybrid 46 is designed for use with pistols from 9mm to .45 ACP and rifles from 5.56mm to .45. Respective adapter required for installation on the system. Modded with digital styled camo.

locales.Name: Steyr AUG 5.56x45 30-round magazine (Black)
locales.Description: 30-round polymer Steyr AUG magazine, for 5.56x45 ammunition. Modded black.

locales.Name: AK Zenit PT-1 stock (Special)
locales.Description: The telescopic PT-1 stock is mounted on the standard place of the stock AK 103, 104, 105, 74M, AKS74U and PP Vityaz, has a length adjustment mechanism and an adjustable cheek. A special lock is required for installation. Special edition.

locales.Name: AK Magpul MOE pistol grip (Special)
locales.Description: Light pistol grip for a AK, produced by Magpul. Special edition.

locales.Name: RD-704 SLR ION Lite + Railed Gas Tube handguard & gas tube combo (Special)
locales.Description: A combined kit of the ION Lite 9 inch handguard with the Railed Gas Tube, can be installed on RD-704 assault rifles. Manufactured by SLR. Special edition.

locales.Name: AK TWS Dog Leg Rail dust cover (Special)
locales.Description: TWS Dog leg rail dust cover with integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on AK platform. Special edition.

locales.Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Delta Carbon handguard (Black)
locales.Description: The GEN III Delta Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems, equipped with a custom interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories. Manufactured by Precision Reflex. Black carbon edition.

locales.Name: SLAAP Armor Plate (Skull)
locales.Description: Custom armor plate from the trader Painter for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, made of a special polyethylene plate.

locales.Name: Glock 17 9x19 pistol slide (Topographic)
locales.Description: Glock 17 custom slide from the trader Painter. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Glock Viper Cut pistol slide (Special)
locales.Description: Glock 17 custom slide from the trader Painter. Modded with special paint.

locales.Name: AK-74 5.45x39 6L23 30-round magazine (Special)
locales.Description: 30-round polymer Izhmash 6L23 magazine for 5.45x39 ammo, for AK-74 and compatible systems. Comes in black and plum. Modded with special paint.

locales.Name: AR-15 Vltor MUR-1S 5.56x45 upper receiver (Painter Edition)
locales.Description: MUR-1S modular upper receiver for AR-based weapons by Vltor company. Fitted with mount for attaching additional equipment. Painter Edition.

locales.Name: Colt M4A1 5.56x45 assault rifle (Topographic)
locales.Description: The Colt M4A1 carbine is a fully automatic variant of the basic M4 Carbine and was primarily designed for special operations use. However, U.S. Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for almost all special operations units, followed later by general introduction of the M4A1 into service with the U.S. Army and Marine Corps. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Kalashnikov AK-103 7.62x39 assault rifle (Topographic)
locales.Description: Kalashnikov 7.62 mm assault rifle equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Remington R11 RSASS 7.62x51 marksman rifle (Black)
locales.Description: The Remington Semi Automatic Sniper System is the culmination of a joint effort between Remington Arms and JP Enterprises to develop a highly accurate and superbly built rapid firing sniper rifle. This weapon delivers sub-MOA accuracy out to 800 meters and beyond while providing the tactical advantage of a semi-automatic platform. Modded black.

locales.Name: CMMG Mk47 Mutant 7.62x39 assault rifle (Topographic)
locales.Description: CMMG Mk47 Mutant, American-made carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm, manufactured by CMMG Inc. Works with all types of AK magazines, including steel, polymer and drums. The carbine has shown exceptional reliability, which, together with the classic ergonomics of the AR system, gives an excellent example of a firearm. This variant features a fully automatic firing mode, for Law Enforcement and Millitary use only. Modded with topographical lines.

locales.Name: Steyr AUG A3 5.56x45 assault rifle (Black)
locales.Description: Steyr AUG A3 is a 5.56x45 bullpup assault rifle, developed by the Austrian company Steyr-Daimler-Puch. AUG is known for good ergonomics, decent accuracy, low recoil and sufficient reliability. The rifle also stands out for its futuristic design. The A3 version features a bolt-catch button. Modded black.

locales.Name: Colt M4A1 5.56x45 assault rifle (Flames)
locales.Description: The Colt M4A1 carbine is a fully automatic variant of the basic M4 Carbine and was primarily designed for special operations use. However, U.S. Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for almost all special operations units, followed later by general introduction of the M4A1 into service with the U.S. Army and Marine Corps. Modded with flame paint.

locales.Name: Colt M4A1 5.56x45 assault rifle (Painter Edition)
locales.Description: The Colt M4A1 carbine is a fully automatic variant of the basic M4 Carbine and was primarily designed for special operations use. However, U.S. Special Operations Command (USSOCOM) was soon to adopt the M4A1 for almost all special operations units, followed later by general introduction of the M4A1 into service with the U.S. Army and Marine Corps. Painter Edition.

locales.Name: SIG MCX SPEAR 6.8x51 assault rifle (Black)
locales.Description: The MCX SPEAR is a multi-caliber assault rifle designed and manufactured by SIG Sauer based on the MCX assault rifle. Primarily chambered in the new 6.8x51mm (.277 FURY) ammunition. Designed specifically for the US Military to replace the M4 carbine.

locales.Name: MCX SPEAR 6.8x51 upper receiver (Black)
locales.Description: A standard-issue upper receiver for the MCX SPEAR assault rifle, chambered in 6.8x51mm (.277 FURY). Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

locales.Name: Angled Grip
locales.Description: Angled grip made by Painter.

locales.Name: AR-10 7.62x51 Lancer L7AWM 20-round magazine (Black)
locales.Description: A 20-round double-stack L7AWM 20 magazine for 7.62x51 NATO ammunition. Manufactured by Lancer Systems. Modded black.

locales.Name: AR-10 7.62x51 Lancer L7AWM 25-round magazine (Black)
locales.Description: A 20-round double-stack L7AWM 20 magazine for 7.62x51 NATO ammunition. Manufactured by Lancer Systems. Modded black.

locales.Name: AR-15 SIG M400 Reduced Angle Pistol Grip
locales.Description: The polymer M400 Reduced Angle Pistol Grip fits any weapon compatible with AR-15 system. Manufactured by SIG Sauer. Modded black.

locales.Name: MCX SPEAR 11 inch M-LOK handguard (Black)
locales.Description: An 11 inch handguard for the MCX SPEAR assault rifle equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories. Manufactured by SIG Sauer. Modded black.

locales.Name: MCX SPEAR charging handle (Black)
locales.Description: A standard-issue ambidextrous charging handle for the MCX SPEAR assault rifle. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

locales.Name: MCX SPEAR SLX68-MG-QD 6.8x51 sound suppressor (Black)
locales.Description: The SLX68-MG-QD suppressor is designed for use with the 6.8x51 (.277 FURY) caliber cartridge. Can only be mounted on Clutch-Lok flash hiders. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

locales.Name: MCX/MPX folding stock adapter buffer tube (Black)
locales.Description: A buffer tube for the folding stock adapter for SIG AR platform rifles and SMGs. Manufactured by SIG Sauer. Black version.

locales.Name: AR-15 Magpul MOE SL-K buttstock (Black)
locales.Description: A quick-detach buttstock for AR-15/M16 rifles with mil-spec buffer tube. Manufactured by Magpul Original Equipment. Black version.

locales.Name: Balaclava (Black)
locales.Description: A definitive black woolen balaclava is not only a head-warmer but soul-warmer too for anyone who is too modest for public heroic deeds.

locales.Name: NPP KlASS Condor gradient glasses
locales.Description: Heavy-duty ballistic shooting glasses with impact-resistant lenses.

locales.Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.1 plate carrier (Black)
locales.Description: The first generation of the modified CPC plate carrier originally designed by Crye Precision and adapted by Ars Arma for use by special forces of the Russian Federation. This modular body armor is based on a polymer harness that fits the thorax, which avoids the plate carrier backlash during active movement and also contributes to a more even distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches. Manufactured by Ars Arma.

locales.Name: 5.11 Tactical TacTec plate carrier (Black)
locales.Description: A plate carrier with a set of pouches for use with assault rifles. Manufactured by 5.11 Tactical.

locales.Name: WARTECH TV-110 plate carrier (Black)
locales.Description: The LBS TV-110 plate carrier equipped with a set of pouches. Manufactured by WARTECH.

locales.Name: Crye Precision AVS plate carrier (Black)
locales.Description: The Crye Precision AVS plate carrier equipped with Groin Protector and pouches in assault configuration. One of the most comfortable to wear plate carriers.
